TEST_NAME: Parent tab should avoid hard coded tab indexes
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapt as (
        select case
                 when (lower(trim(image_attributes)) like '%tabindex%' ) then 'N' 
                 else 'Y'
               end pass_yn,
               application_id,
               image_attributes,
               last_updated_by,
               last_updated_on,
               build_option,
               tab_name,
               parent_tab_id,
	             workspace
        from apex_application_parent_tabs
    )
select aapt.pass_yn,                          
       aapt.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapt.last_updated_by,
       aapt.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Parent Tab `%0` (app %1) has hard coded tab index', 
        p0 => aapt.tab_name, 
        p1 => aapt.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Parent Tab `%0` (app %1) has hard coded tab index', 
        p0 => aapt.tab_name, 
        p1 => aapt.application_id) issue_title,
       aapt.parent_tab_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapt.tab_name,
			 aapt.workspace
from aapt
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapt.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapt.application_id
where aapt.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.4.3 Focus OrderChecking application where tabindex has been added to an attribute that have negative impact on tab/focus order
